title: BIR Form 1604-E — Annual Information Return of Creditable Income Taxes Withheld (Expanded)

fields.label: 2. Amended Return?
fields.summary: Tick Yes if this return corrects a prior filing; otherwise tick No.

fields.label: 3. Number of Sheets Attached
fields.summary: Write number of additional sheets (alphalist, schedules) attached.

fields.label: 4. Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)
fields.summary: Write 9–12 digit TIN (include branch code if any).

fields.label: 5. RDO Code
fields.summary: Write assigned Revenue District Office code.

fields.label: 6. Withholding Agent’s Name
fields.summary: For individuals: Last, First, Middle. For non-individuals: Registered Name.

fields.label: 7. Registered Address
fields.summary: Write complete address. If branch, indicate branch address.

fields.label: 7A. ZIP Code
fields.summary: Write ZIP code of registered address.

fields.label: 8A. Top Withholding Agent?
fields.summary: If private, tick Yes if among top withholding agents; otherwise No.

fields.label: 10. Email Address
fields.summary: Write valid email address (if none, leave blank).

fields.label: Schedule 1 – Per BIR Form No. 1601-EQ
fields.summary: Fill quarterly details: Date of Remittance, Bank/Agency, TRA/eROR/eAR Number, Taxes Withheld, Penalties, Total Remitted.

fields.label: Schedule 2 – Per BIR Form No. 1606
fields.summary: Fill monthly details: January–December with Date of Remittance, Bank/Agency, Reference Number, Taxes Withheld, Penalties, Total Remitted.

fields.label: Schedule 3 – Payees Subject to Expanded Withholding Tax
fields.summary: List each payee: SEQ No., TIN, Full Name, ATC, Income Payment, Tax Rate, Amount Withheld (use BIR Form 2307 as basis).

fields.label: Schedule 4 – Payees Exempt from Withholding but Subject to Income Tax
fields.summary: List each payee: SEQ No., TIN, Full Name, ATC, Nature of Income Payment, Income Amount (use BIR Form 2304 as basis).

fields.label: Taxpayer/Authorized Representative
fields.summary: Sign over printed name; indicate title/designation and TIN.

fields.label: Non-Individual (Corp/Org)
fields.summary: Signature of President/Vice President/Authorized Officer with Title and TIN.

fields.label: Tax Agent Accreditation/Attorney’s Roll No.
fields.summary: If applicable, write accreditation number, date of issue and expiry, or attorney’s roll number.
